com.amazonaws.services.simpleworkflow.flow.annotations

Annotation Type ExponentialRetryWithJitter


  • @Target(value=METHOD)
 @Retention(value=RUNTIME)
public @interface ExponentialRetryWithJitter
    This annotation can be used for retrying failures on any asynchronous executions. This is an expansion of the annotation ExponentialRetry
    Author:
    congwan

    • Optional Element Summary

      Optional Elements 
      Modifier and Type Optional Element and Description
      double backoffCoefficient 
      Class<? extends Throwable>[] exceptionsToRetry 
      Class<? extends Throwable>[] excludeExceptions 
      long initialRetryIntervalSeconds 
      int maximumAttempts 
      long maximumRetryIntervalSeconds 
      double maxJitterCoefficient 
      long retryExpirationSeconds

        public abstract double maxJitterCoefficient
        Default:

        Default:

        public abstract long retryExpirationSeconds
